name: Review 2
instruction: Match each word with its definition.
instruction_vi: Nối từ với định nghĩa của nó.

answers.definition: a description of somebody or something that gives useful information about them
a student who goes to a foreign country to study, usually as a part of a programme
a public performance of music; a public music show
happening in the usual way; showing what something is usually like
an object used for producing musical sounds, for example a piano or a drum
a group of objects (usually of the same type), that have been kept or brought together
a small group of musicians who play popular music together, often with a singer or singers
a TV show or film that is about a serious subject
an outdoor meal or party where food is cooked
to like one thing or person better than another
a film, radio or television program giving facts about something
a TV show or film that is very funny, usually with a happy ending
an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time
a person who introduces and plays music, on radio or television or at a club
